WorkItem.ClosedComment: Closing this as not an issue - it's been a couple weeks w/o further traction on this.
WorkItem.Description:
I'm wondering if dodge is rated incorrectly or at least why it is so highly for TankDKs.
 
In both rawr3 beta and 2.3.14, when I load my character from the armory (EonarUS, Xaris) I look at the gear comparisons for waist.  My DK has the Verdigris Chain Belt, socketed with 2 x Solid Dragon's Eye and 1 x Solid Majestic Zircon.  So, 2 x 51 STA gems and 1 30 STA gem.   However, when looking at the gear comparisons - Rawr is claiming that the Verdigris Chain Belt is better with a 15stam/10dodge gem and 2 x 30 STA gems.
 
So in other words, Rawr is saying that 75 stamina & 10 dodge is quite a bit better for survival & mitigation than 132 stamina.
 
Is this correct and if so why?

Comments.Message:
Sounds like the optimizer doesn't know you're a JC.  Be sure to have the Jewelcrafter cuts enabled in the gemming templates and just to make sure, in the filters as well.  
And yes, there are times that Dodge > Stam.  Esp if it's trying to match a socket bonus, or support a meta, either of which can be the case here:
24 Stam + 10 Dodge Rating is certainly greater in most cases than raw 30 Stam.
